subject: Rugby
World Cup 2015 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Japan fullback Ayumu Goromaru has snubbed his country’s new Super Rugby team, the Sunwolves, in favor of the Australia franchise, the Queensland Reds.
snippet: Japan fullback Ayumu Goromaru has snubbed his country’s new Super Rugby team, the Sunwolves, in favor of the Australia franchise, the Queensland Reds.
